particle.description: The particle type that will be spawned.
particle.markdownDescription: The particle type that will be spawned.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the particle will only be visible if this bi-entity condition is fulfilled by either or both the entity that has the power and the entity looking at the entity that has the power.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the particle will only be visible if this bi-entity condition is fulfilled by either or both the entity that has the power and the entity looking at the entity that has the power.

count.description: Determines the amount of particles to spawn.
count.markdownDescription: Determines the amount of particles to spawn.

speed.description: Determines the speed of the specified particle type.
speed.markdownDescription: Determines the speed of the specified particle type.

force.description: Determines whether to display the emitted particles within 512 blocks (`true`) or 32 blocks (`false`).
force.markdownDescription: Determines whether to display the emitted particles within 512 blocks (`true`) or 32 blocks (`false`).

spread.description: Determines the size of the three-dimensional cuboid volume to spawn the specified particle type in.
spread.markdownDescription: Determines the size of the three-dimensional cuboid volume to spawn the specified particle type in.

offset_x.description: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the X axis.
offset_x.markdownDescription: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the X axis.

offset_y.description: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Y axis.
offset_y.markdownDescription: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Y axis.

offset_z.description: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Z axis.
offset_z.markdownDescription: The offset of where the particle will be centered in the Z axis.

frequency.description: Determines how often the particles should spawn (interval in ticks).
frequency.markdownDescription: Determines how often the particles should spawn (interval in ticks).

visible_in_first_person.description: Determines whether the particle type should be visible in first person.
visible_in_first_person.markdownDescription: Determines whether the particle type should be visible in first person.

visible_while_invisible.description: Determines whether the particle type should be visible if the entity is invisible.
visible_while_invisible.markdownDescription: Determines whether the particle type should be visible if the entity is invisible.

type.description:
## Particle

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/particle)

Spawns particles on the body of the entity that has the power for visual effects.

Type ID: `origins:particle`




---

### Examples

```json
{
  	"type": "origins:particle",
  	"particle": "minecraft:portal",
  	"frequency": 4
}
```

This example will continuously spawn portal particles on the entity that has the power.
